name: Horse Paradise - My Dream Ranch
description: Play and race as your dream wild horse in an exciting multiplayer adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct 3D compatible graphics card with 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 200 Mb Available Space
